name: Super Basket Roll
description:
I made this game in 2016 for a friend of mine.
 - Controls -
Space: Throw
Up: Jump (release to throw)
You have 10 balls to make a highscore, extra points for doing the throw mentioned in the top right.

I'm sorry if there are problems with the sound or if your Antivirus-Software doesn't like the file, there are no viruses but don't trust me, I'm just a stranger from the internet.
